title: Danger Decoded
overview: Danger Decoded is the show that analyses a series of real-life disaster situations, caught on camera and challenges you to discover the crucial warning signs. Get ready to analyse danger. In National Geographic Channel's brand new show Danger Decoded you will be presented with a series of moments when disaster is about to strike. Your job is to look for the evidence, detect the real risks and spot that one critical clue that will lead to the ultimate outcome. Will you identify the warning signs and decode the danger?Â
